course_title: Italian Literature of the Middle Ages

101.comments: Italian literature of the Middle Ages in its intellectual, socio-political and cultural context. Dante and his contemporaries and/or immediate followers (may include Petrarch and Boccaccio). Full description: https://fhis.ubc.ca/course-description/ital404/- cross-listed with ITST 414-101, RMST 420C-101 and RMST 520-101

description: Italian literature of the Middle Ages in its intellectual, socio-political and cultural context. Dante and his contemporaries and/or immediate followers (may include Petrarch and Boccaccio). Precludes credit for ITST 414.
